# Hi There

I am Adrien, French researcher in Meta-science. I have a background in applied social psychology and expertise in conducting litterature review and meta-analysis. Besides my work as a researcher, I am also the host of the podcast ["science of doing science"](https://anchor.fm/scienceofdoingscience), a podcast dedicated to meta-science. I have a french Instagram account and newsletter where I talk about news in psychology. Hope you enjoy!
